DOC.brief_summary: Primary Aim : To estimate antidepressant efficacy simvastatin versus placebo adjunct lithium , valproate , and/or atypical antipsychotic therapy among individual bipolar I disorder nonpsychotic major depressive episode . Hypothesis : Simvastatin superior placebo improvement depressive symptom assess Montgomery-Asberg Depression Rating Scale ( MADRS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Simvastatin Augmentation Lithium Treatment Bipolar Depression
